sentences.en: Also, FPL could mildly excite uterine, in which safflower play a main role.
sentences.cn: 促孕液也能缓和地促进子宫运动, 其中红花起主要作用.

sentences.en: Bad ambitions, bad education, bad dealings, and bad earnings excite fear.
sentences.cn: 有寄的野心, 劣质的教育, 不道德的交易和不义之财刺激了恐惧.

sentences.en: He's delirious with the pain and fever, try not to excite him.
sentences.cn: 他因为疼痛和发烧精神混乱, 尽力不要让他激动.

sentences.en: Here are recipes that will excite your taste buds.
sentences.cn: 本书收录了一些能刺激味蕾的菜谱.

sentences.en: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.cn: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

sentences.en: How odd that the touch of his hands did not excite her!
sentences.cn: 真奇怪,怎么跟他拉着手她也不感到激动 呀 ?

sentences.en: Lasers can excite specific modes of the reactants.
sentences.cn: 而用激光则能够激发反应物的某些特定的运动模式.

sentences.en: Lawrence is one of those writers who either excite you enormously or leave you cold.
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯是那种要么让人激动不已，要么让人觉得索然无味的作家。

sentences.en: Meclophenoxate can adjust the metabolization of neurocyte and excite nerve system.
sentences.cn: 能调节神经细胞代谢,兴奋神经系统,是一种有效的刺激糖原的药物.

sentences.en: Reports of the plot of this unusual film tend to excite revulsion.
sentences.cn: 有关这部不同寻常电影的情节的报道常常令人生厌。

sentences.en: Sometimes these things excite people, and sometimes things confuse or trouble them.
sentences.cn: 有时这些事情使人们兴奋, 有时它们又使他们困惑或烦恼.

sentences.en: Such photons will excite the higher vibrational levels of the OH molecule.
sentences.cn: 这种光子会激发OH分子的较高振动能级.

sentences.en: The court case has excited a lot of public interest.
sentences.cn: 这场官司引起了公众的极大兴趣。

sentences.en: They warm and excite us'Cause we have the brightest love.
sentences.cn: 我们兴奋温暖,因为我们的爱情最明亮.

sentences.en: We're constantly working on new ways to excite you!
sentences.cn: 我们正不断地寻找新方法让你振奋起来!

sentences.en: What subjects excite and upset you at the moment?
sentences.cn: 现在有什麽令你兴奋或是失望的话题 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yahoo was the exception, but Excite, Infoseek, HotBot and Lycos began as search engines.
sentences.cn: Yahoo是个例外, 但是Excite, Infoseek, HotBot和 Lycos都开始转型成为了搜索引擎.

words.tran_cn: 易激动的；易兴奋的；易怒的
令人兴奋的；使人激动的
[生理] 兴奋性，应激性；可激发性
兴奋；刺激；令人兴奋的事物

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

trans.tran_cn: 刺激； 使兴奋， 使激动
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager
